data.actual_result: After someone adding reaction on your chat, you jumped to your chat that got reaction by people
data.expected_result: Nothing should've happened, the chat should've stay where you scrolled on
data.short_description: When someone giving reaction on your post while you scroll up, it scrolled back to your post
data.steps_to_repro: - Post something - Try ask someone to add reaction before you scrolled up the chat - Scroll the chat up
